name: Dimensional Tic Tac Toe
description:
Play 2 to 5 dimensional Tic Tac Toe with up to five players. Computer bots have three difficulties to choose from so you can enjoy the game at any skill level. Wanna know how to win? -the in game Assist Mode allows players to view possible winning lines by hovering. Test your friends multi-dimensional thinking or try to beat each difficulty. 

Every dimension is visualized in 2D but you have to make sure that the line you are trying to make works with all dimensions.

Have fun and thanks for playing!
